sentences.en: A newspaper published every day or every weekday.
sentences.cn: 每天或每周出版的报纸.

sentences.en: After weekday, the group leader urges exercise, always close insufficient.
sentences.cn: 周日之后, 组长催作业, 总是收不够.

sentences.en: Class One will play football with Class Two _________ next weekday.
sentences.cn: 下星期后一班将和二班踢足球.

sentences.en: Don't you go to the office on weekday?
sentences.cn: 难道你工作日不上班 吗 ?

sentences.en: Every weekday ~~ Repeats the item Monday - Friday.
sentences.cn: 每个工作日~~每个工作日都重复该项目.

sentences.en: For an evening, ( especially a weekday ) it really is.
sentences.cn: 一瓶真的够了, 特别是 工作日.

sentences.en: I go to work every weekday, and sometimes on saturday.
sentences.cn: 您通常去工作吗?您是每个周日去,每天去, 或每隔一天去? 您周末做什么?

sentences.en: If you want to avoid the crowds, it's best to come on a weekday.
sentences.cn: 如果想避免人多，最好在周一到周五来。

sentences.en: In the data whole situation falls, 7 weekday are dealt with end.
sentences.cn: 在资料完整的情况下, 7个工作日办理完毕.

sentences.en: It carried an average of 2.3 million passengers per weekday in 1998.
sentences.cn: 一九九八年内,地下铁路平日的平均载客量达230万人次.

sentences.en: It's called weekday veg. The name says it all.
sentences.cn: 我把它叫做“上班日吃素”,从名字就可以知道它的意思.

sentences.en: Passenger : Maybe I should go on a weekday when it's not crowded.
sentences.cn: 乘客 ︰ 或许我应该非假日去,到时才不会人挤人.

sentences.en: Refashion reissues new card needs 7 weekday.
sentences.cn: 重制补发新卡需7个工作日.

sentences.en: This a monthly event held on a weekday's evening.
sentences.cn: 这聚会每月一次,会安排在工作天的傍晚举行.

sentences.en: You can have your goods delivered on any weekday.
sentences.cn: 您要求在任何工作日装运货物均可.

trans.tran_en: any day of the week except Saturday and Sunday
